titleStmt.title: A learned and fruitfull sermon preached in Christs Church in Norwich. By Mr. Nevvhouse, late preacher of Gods word there.
titleStmt.author: Newhouse, Thomas, d. 1611.
Hill, Robert, d. 1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Snodham] for Ionas Man, and are to be solde at the signe of the Talbot in Paternoster-row,

notesStmt.note: Includes, at end, "A right godly prayer, made by Mr. Newhouse".
Caption title: A sermon preached at great S. Maries, in Cambridge.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Talbot in Paternoster-row
